sentences.en: Don't be impatient with your children.
Don't get impatient about trivial thing like that.
He gave another impatient glance at his watch.
sentences.cn: 他又一次不耐烦地看了看他的表.

sentences.en: He is impatient with those who decry the scheme.
sentences.cn: 对于那些反对该方案的人，他表现得很不耐烦。

sentences.en: He turned away with an impatient gesture.
sentences.cn: 他做了个不耐烦的手势转过身去。

sentences.en: He was impatient of all this waiting.
He was impatient to get home.
He was so impatient that I could hardly hold him back.
sentences.cn: 他是那样急躁,我简直拉不住他.

sentences.en: I'd been waiting for twenty minutes and I was getting impatient.
sentences.cn: 我等了二十分钟，有点不耐烦了。

sentences.en: It's true she gets madly impatient with him, but what mother doesn't?
sentences.cn: 她确实对他极其不耐烦，但哪个母亲不是这样呢？

sentences.en: One thing I’ve noticed is that when people have to wait, they become impatient or uncomfortable.
sentences.cn: 我注意到一件事，就是当人们在等待的时候，人们会变的没有耐心、焦躁不安。

sentences.en: She chided herself for being so impatient with the children.
sentences.cn: 她责怪自己对孩子不够耐心。

sentences.en: She was impatient to know what had happened to her son.
sentences.cn: 她急于想知道她儿子出了什么事.

sentences.en: The big clubs are becoming increasingly impatient at the rate of progress.
sentences.cn: 大牌俱乐部对缓慢的进展越来越不耐烦了。

sentences.en: The impatient drivers were beeping their horns.
sentences.cn: 不耐烦的司机们在按喇叭发嘟嘟声。

sentences.en: They are impatient for jobs and security.
sentences.cn: 他们渴望得到工作，获取安全感。

sentences.en: With an impatient gesture he thrust the food away from him.
sentences.cn: 他不耐烦地把吃的东西猛地推开.

trans.tran_cn: 没有耐心的，迫切的，不能容忍的
trans.tran_en: annoyed because of delays, someone else’s mistakes etc
